name: Old Man Harris

topics.topic_text: Whoa, slow down, grandpa. What's wrong?
topics.response_text: What's wrong? You don't see anything wrong with a quiet little town full of friendly people in the middle of a blasted wasteland?

topics.topic_text: Yeah... you go get some sleep, crazy old man. I'll be going now...
topics.response_text: If you know what's good for you, you'll get out as soon as you can. They're crazy! Crazy, I tell you!

topics.topic_text: Well, I haven't talked to anyone here but you. Are they friendly?
topics.response_text: No! Well... yes. But it's all a trick. Don't you know anything? Does that number on your back mean that you just crawled out of a vault or something?{Afraid, Warning the player.}

topics.topic_text: Well, I'll be careful, I guess.
topics.response_text: You should! Otherwise, you'll end up just like the rest!

topics.topic_text: Shhh.... time for a nap, gramps.
topics.response_text: What? You don't believe me? Just look in the basements! Or out in that shed! You'll see what I mean!
Nothin' wrong with being friendly, but these folks aren't just friendly  they're killers!

topics.topic_text: You're right. I hate friendly people.
topics.response_text: And you're right sensible to. Especially around here. The friendly neighbor bit is just an act, these people are stone cold killers!

topics.topic_text: What's going to happen to the kids?
topics.response_text: They'll stay here with me and I'll raise them myself. It's a shame that they have to grow up without their parents.
We'll do our best, is what we'll do. Me an the kids here in Andale... what's left of it, anyway.

topics.topic_text: So, you grew up here too?
topics.response_text: Sure did. Can't say that I'm proud of it, though. It was all just normal. It's what we all did. I didn't ever think much about it.
I saw what happened out there, stranger. Those people may have been my family but... it had to be done.

conversation.response_text: Get out! Get out while you can!

description:
Old Man Harris is a 75 year-old Caucasian Male.

An elderly man living on the outskirts of Andale in a small, weathered shack. His face is lined with wrinkles, and his eyes show a lifetime of hardship and caution. Despite his age, he maintains a sharp awareness of his surroundings.

Old Man Harris's Personality: Cautious and reserved, Old Man Harris is deeply concerned about the safety of outsiders in Andale. He appears weary and resigned to his situation, but possesses a quiet moral compass that surfaces when discussing the town's dark secrets.

Old Man Harris's Backstory: Old Man Harris was born and raised in Andale, though he has always felt uneasy about the town's traditions. As he grew older, he became increasingly uncomfortable with the practices of the town's residents but lacked the courage to leave or openly oppose them. He now lives alone on the perimeter, hoping to maintain some distance from the community's darker activities while still being close enough to avoid suspicion.
